title: Chapter 1847 - The Six Paths Sword Wheel
body:
Chapter 1847 - The Six Paths Sword Wheel

A month later, Buried Dragon Ridge.

Boom!

Sword qi crisscrossed, rumbling and booming like thunder.

A blood-red figure shattered the sword qi filling the sky with a swing of its palm.

Bang!!

Su Yi was sent flying back, covered in blood. His wounds were severe, and his body was cracked like broken porcelain. His handsome face was deathly pallid.

Before he could respond, that blood-red figure attacked explosively, its entire body emanating ferocious majesty. This was a wraith comparable to a Great Profound Stage expert!

Su Yi turned and fled without hesitation.

Whoosh!

He vanished into thin air.

The Great Profound Stage wraith roared with bitterness, and a long time passed before it turned and re-entered Buried Dragon Ridge.

“Still not enough, huh…?” Su Yi reappeared out of nowhere, not far from the ridge, with a hint of exasperation on his brow.

He’d come to Buried Dragon Ridge seven times over the past month to fight this Great Profound Stage wraith.

He wasn’t using the mysteries of Profound Ruin, nor did he use any of his treasures. He was relying purely on his own strength to fight it.

Every battle was incomparably fierce, leaving Su Yi badly injured, his life hanging in the...
original_title: Chapter 1847 - The Six Paths Sword Wheel
